paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Usually Portuguese patients carrying the V30M mutation present disease in their mid-30s, with an 80–90% penetrance.

Usually Portuguese patients carrying the V30M mutation present disease in their mid-30s, with an 80–90% penetrance.
However, some particular V30M carriers did not present disease.

functional_data.summary: The V30M mutation leads to a progressive polyneuropathy due to misfolding and amyloid formation.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and family studies.
variants.additional_notes: The T119M mutation on the second allele in compound heterozygotes was noted to halt misfolding.
key_quotes: Usually Portuguese patients carrying the V30M mutation present disease in their mid-30s, with an 80–90% penetrance.
However, some particular V30M carriers did not present disease, and it was revealed that these carriers were compound heterozygote for another mutation, T119M on the second allele.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
